title: Measurement of Autistic Traits using Non-verbal Communication Skills
abstract: In this paper, iPad application NOCOA+ which includes movie data to enhance human communication and socialization in real world is proposed. Factor analysis of autism spectrum quotient to determine non-verbal information contributing communication and socialization is implemented, and movie data towards the development of NOCOA+ is recorded. An experiment confirmed a significant relationship between communication and socialization scores and non-verbal communication skills.
